extendedInfo.description: "The most comprehensive IQ test on Android Market."Are you a logical thinker? A numerical whiz? A Verbal genius? Or are you spatially inclined? Are you looking for intellectual stimulation? Find out how smart you are and test or increase your IQ with our IQ Test app.This app measures several factors of intelligence, namely logical reasoning, math skills, language abilities, spatial relations skills, knowledge retained, comprehension, visualization etc., and it reveals your key cognizant strengths and weaknesses. The IQ Test contains over 927 questions on different topics.In addition to measuring your general IQ, our exclusive test assesses your performance in 13 different areas of intelligence, revealing your key cognizant strengths and weaknesses.â¨ These areas are:â Analogyâ Blood Relationshipâ Classificationâ Coding - Decodingâ Direction Senseâ Logical Reasoningâ Mathematical Operationsâ Number, Ranking and Sequenceâ Pattern Recognitionâ Seriesâ Statement & Conclusionsâ Venn Diagramsâ Visualization~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~TEST RESULTS WITH EXPLANATION:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~A summary of the test is presented at the end of each test. It shows you the time you took, the score, which questions you answered correctly and where you were wrong, explanation for almost every question. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~PROGRESS METER:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~The app records your progress as you start practicing different areas of intelligence. It shows you a beautifully pie chart so that you can track your weak areas and retry the questions you answered incorrectly.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~FEATURE LIST:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~â¢ Over 927 multiple-choice questions.â¢ Choose number of questions you would like in each test.â¢ Track your progress.â¢ A new module, âProgress Meterâ keeps track of how you are performing in a particular topicâ¢ Special algorithm that randomizes questions every time you take a test.Keywords : analogy, classification, diagrams, pattern, recognition, series, visualization, analytical, app, application, aptitude, brain, brilliant, intelligence, iq, logical, quotient, reasoning, skills, test.

reviews.title: Will not download, a ripoff!!
reviews.comment: Too many bugs!!
reviews.author: Ron Sizemore

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: If you\'re looking for an I.Q. test app, this is by far the best.
reviews.author: Ben DeBlois

reviews.title: Liked Because
reviews.comment: If you get answer wrong, it tells you correct answer and most importantly, it tells you WHY  Reason to the correct answer. Not many books or apps have this... Probably why they are horrible books and apps. Get this app... Very well done. You actual learn thought process and get better.
reviews.author: John Chung

reviews.title: can\'t open the full version even though i purchased it!
reviews.comment: i bought a full version of this app. it was installed but when i\'m trying to open, there was a license checking. and then a message box says that the downloaded game is not licensed!!! i pay for it and yet can\'t play it.
reviews.author: Jane Delos Santos

reviews.title: I like it.
reviews.comment: Some of the questions in math aren\'t presented very well, but that could be because I\'ve forgotten so much math and it just looks alien to me.It\'s a good app though, worth my dollar I think.
reviews.author: Terry Trezner

reviews.title: Decent.
reviews.comment: Genuinely challenging criteria. However results aren\'t saved. At least not obviously.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great teasers
reviews.comment: I choose many logical answers to find that it is wrong. Many of the questions  are very open to interpretation. Several group of answers have more than one that are logically balanced, but is incorrect through the eyes lf the creator. Other than that the questions are fun teasers and are very creative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems pretty authentic... With the odd anomoly
reviews.comment: This app seems pretty authentic. It tests you very well with logic, math, etc problems. Also, like the other poster says, it EXPLAINS WHY you got it wrong. My only real gripe is that some of the explanations are open for interpretation: for instance, which is the odd one out? Lake, Stream, River, Canal? I put canal, because it is the only man-made structure, but no, the answer is lake because all the others are FLOWING.  So I get marked down, even though I am right. It seems very wrong to me that someone can be marked down because some test doesn`t get the answer it wants even if the answer is actually correct. Is this how all IQ tetsts go? Because it means that a smart person who doesn`t understand the culture will be given an IQ of 10 and look like an idiot.  Something to think about. That said it`s pretty correct on most other stuff and was very annoyed to get only 110 which makes me average. But i guess I just got to keep training my brain and improve. Good App. 4 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incorrect questions and answers
reviews.comment: There are mistakes that are either bad spelling, bad diction or just plain wrong answers.  Eg. Difference between Dog, Monkey, Cat and Fox.  Monkey as the others eat flesh?  Or Lake, River, Canal, Stream is Lake, because the lake does nor flow?  There are also answers that are not in the choices given.  Gets 3 stars as I was flattered to continuously get genius and above average.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great feedback
reviews.comment: The test(s) are well designed, as generically worded as possible, and cover a good range.  (And, yes, so far, it\'s producing results consistent with my previous tests).  However, the primary reason I gave it a \"5\" was the feedback it provides after each test - well done!  It doesn\'t just give you the answers, but reminds you of the original questions, tells you the difficulty level of each question and provides complete explanations of how you should have arrived at the correct answer.  (i.e., even if the results are not accurate, you\'ll still benefit from the feedback and become smarter anyway.)  So, if the old saying \"if a survey is only as good as the guy who wrote it\" is true, then this developer is pretty sharp as well.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well put out, but...
reviews.comment: Has silly errors in grammar, spelling and most important of all, they forgot Z in the alphabet. This makes several answers wrong!
reviews.author: Siddharth Karia

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: Decent test, accurate scoring. However, truly accurate IQ tests never require the taker to posses prior knowledge, ie: Calender rotation, angles, analog clock positions, etc. Otherwise definitely worth the time and money. ,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: SIMPLY THE BEST!!!  \"PIRATE - X \"

reviews.comment: I scored IQ 184 on your test, Sincerely  C J Stephan Brissman (where can I save it).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Hours of fun and great brain training
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A lot of wrong answers. Example would be mirror images and the answer not being a mirror image. Whoever wrote the test also has bad grammar and punctuation. Another flaw would be cultural difference between who wrote the test and whonis taking the test. Most americans don\'t consider a cow to be a pet etc. I don\'t think the writer is english speaking by first language so there are discrepancies found and problematic translations as well as meanings conveyed being skewed.\tI\'m not sure if there are issues with some of the programming and how certain answers like the mirror issue can come up (the mirror image contained no dot that the original image had in question), or if the writer of the test overlooked details, but I would take your test results with a grain of salt. I have scored (chronologically) 120, 76 and 152 lol
reviews.author: A Google User
